rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with Bohemian decor elements and warm lighting. The entrance is oriented to the north-east according to Vastu for positive energy.
Two-car garage, spacious and functional. The design incorporates storage areas and a neat organization to adhere to local building norms.
Bohemian-style living room with eclectic furnishings, vibrant textiles, and natural light. Features a large window oriented to the east as per Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated gym space with equipment storage, integrated into the duplex design. The layout considers optimum ventilation and ample natural light, oriented per Vastu.
A functional kitchen designed with Bohemian aesthetics. The layout prioritizes easy access from the living area and includes Vastu considerations such as north or east-facing windows.
Essential bathroom with efficient layout, considering local building norms and Vastu water element placement to ensure smooth energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed for ease of access and adherence to Vastu principles.
Large window in the living room providing ample natural light.
